title: PagerDuty Team
description: Blueprint representing a PagerDuty team in our software catalog

link.title: Team URL
link.description: The URL of the PagerDuty team

summary.title: Summary
summary.description: The summary of the PagerDuty team

defaultRole.title: Default Role
defaultRole.description: The default role of the PagerDuty team

title: PagerDuty User
description: Blueprint representing a PagerDuty user in our software catalog

email.title: Email
email.description: The email address of the PagerDuty user

timeZone.title: Time Zone
timeZone.description: The time zone of the PagerDuty user

role.title: Role
role.description: The role of the PagerDuty user

jobTitle.title: Job Title
jobTitle.description: The job title of the PagerDuty user

link.title: User URL
link.description: The URL of the PagerDuty user

currentlyOnCall.title: Currently On Call?
currentlyOnCall.description: Whether the user is currently on-call and part of an active rotation's cycle.

onCallSchedule.title: On Call Schedule
onCallSchedule.description: The user's on-call schedule dashboard link.

nextOnCallStart.title: Next OnCall Start
nextOnCallStart.description: The date and time at which user will start their next active rotation, taking all overrides into account.

nextOnCallEnd.title: Next OnCall End
nextOnCallEnd.description: The date and time at which user will end their next active rotation, taking all overrides into account.

teams.title: Teams
teams.description: The teams associated with this user

title: PagerDuty Service
description: Blueprint representing a PagerDuty service in our software catalog

lastIncident.title: Last Incident
lastIncident.description: The date/time when the most recent incident was created for this PagerDuty service

status.title: Status
status.description: The status of the PagerDuty service

link.title: Service URL
link.description: The URL of the PagerDuty service

resolveTimeout.title: Auto Resolve Incidents Timeout
resolveTimeout.description: Time in seconds that an incident is automatically resolved if left open for that long

creationDate.title: Creation Date
creationDate.description: The date/time when this PagerDuty service was created

acknowledgementTimeout.title: Acknowledged Incidents Timeout
acknowledgementTimeout.description: Time in seconds that an incident changes to the Triggered State after being Acknowledged.

teams.title: Teams
teams.description: The teams associated with this service

escalationPolicy.title: Escalation Policy
escalationPolicy.description: The PagerDuty escalation policy associated with this service

title: PagerDuty Incident
description: Blueprint representing a PagerDuty incident in our software catalog

incidentNumber.title: Incident Number
incidentNumber.description: The number of the PagerDuty incident

summary.title: Incident Summary
summary.description: The summary of the PagerDuty incident

urgency.title: Incident Urgency
urgency.description: The urgency level of the PagerDuty incident

priority.title: Priority
priority.description: Latest priority assigned by responders in PagerDuty to the incident.

incidentType.title: Incident Type
incidentType.description: The name of the Incident Type of the PagerDuty incident

link.title: Incident URL
link.description: The URL of the PagerDuty incident

status.title: Incident Status
status.description: The status of the PagerDuty incident

assignedVia.title: Assigned Via
assignedVia.description: The method of assignment of the PagerDuty incident

createdAt.title: Create At
createdAt.description: The creation timestamp of the PagerDuty incident

updatedAt.title: Updated At
updatedAt.description: The last updated timestamp of the PagerDuty incident

resolvedAt.title: Resolved At
resolvedAt.description: The resolution timestamp of the PagerDuty incident

lastStatusChangedAt.title: Last Status Changed At
lastStatusChangedAt.description: The time the status of the incident last changed.

service.title: PagerDuty Service
service.description: The PagerDuty service associated with this incident

teams.title: Teams
teams.description: The teams associated with this incident

escalationPolicy.title: PagerDuty Escalation Policy
escalationPolicy.description: The PagerDuty escalation policy associated with this incident

title: PagerDuty Escalation Policy
description: Blueprint representing a PagerDuty Escalation Policy in our software catalog

link.title: Escalation Policy URL
link.description: The URL of the PagerDuty Escalation Policy

summary.title: Summary
summary.description: The summary of the PagerDuty escalation policy

onCallHandoffNotifications.title: On Call Handoff Notifications
onCallHandoffNotifications.description: The On Call Handoff Notifications of the PagerDuty escalation policy

loops.title: Repeat Loops
loops.description: The number of times the escalation policy will repeat after reaching the end of its escalation.

rules.title: Rules
rules.description: A JSON object describing the conditional rules this escalation follows to determine who and when to alert.

teams.title: Teams
teams.description: The PagerDuty teams associated with this escalation policy
